name: Spotify token handling
description: An implementation of the authorization code flow

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Your spotify app id, found the spotify developer dashboard.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your spotify client secret, found the spotify developer dashboard.

ENCRYPTION_SECRET.description: Any arbitrary string to use to encrypt/decrypt refresh tokens.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_CALLBACK.description: Your spotify app redirect URL, found the spotify developer dashboard.
